title: [ISSUE] [15/03/16] Client Crash/Lag issues relating to club tags
body:
Hey everyone,

There is currently a known issue relating to club tags in champion select, causing everyone in champ select to have their clients "pause" momentarily. This is currently being investigated and should be resolved soon.

**Updates:**

**15/03/16 7:10pm AEDT** - The issue has been narrowed down and a test case has been worked out. Riot is currently working on resolving the issue.

**15/03/16 7:38pm AEDT** -  Further testing has been done and a potential fix is currently being worked on.

**15/03/16 8:42pm AEDT** - A temporary fix has been applied, for now club tags will not appear in the client and will only appear once you get into a game. This will remain the case until the root cause of the issue has been resolved.

replies.body: The recent patch for the new skin release is causing the entire client to lag out and stop responding for several seconds to minutes
